title: Patching no longer working?
body:
Every time I launch the Alpha Client, I get the "update required" popup, followed by error code 004

http://imgur.com/a/oPpXL

then it goes into update mode, but just keeps trying to update, with no update available

http://imgur.com/a/cXLRa

replies.body:
Never mind, had to do a complete reinstall and download for it to work again properly.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
